name: just drive.
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50

What is Ludum Dare? Ludum Dare is an online event where games are made from scratch in a weekend.

Theme: Delay the Inevitable

Submission Page

The Game

just drive is a narrative game about moving on and appreciating things for what they are. Drive around the forest and work through all the thoughts in your head. 

Controls:

AD - Move Left/Right

Mouse - Click

See more of my games here
